statements: SELECT customer_id, purchase_amount, purchase_date, reward_points FROM customer_purchases WHERE customer_id = 1
SELECT * FROM customer_purchases WHERE purchase_amount > 100
SELECT customer_id, purchase_date FROM customer_purchases WHERE reward_points > 50 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC
SELECT DISTINCT customer_id FROM customer_purchases WHERE purchase_date >= '2021-01-01'
SELECT count(*), SUM(purchase_amount) FROM customer_purchases
SELECT * FROM customer_purchases WHERE purchase_amount > 1000 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT customer_id, purchase_amount FROM customer_purchases WHERE reward_points > 50 ORDER BY purchase_amount ASC
SELECT * FROM customer_purchases WHERE purchase_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 AND reward_points < 20 ORDER BY customer_id
SELECT customer_id, purchase_date FROM customer_purchases WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY purchase_amount DESC
SELECT AVG(purchase_amount) AS average_purchase FROM customer_purchases
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, total_purchases FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, total_purchases FROM customers ORDER BY total_purchases DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, total_purchases FROM customers WHERE total_purchases > 1000;
SELECT c.customer_name, r.rewards_points FROM customers c JOIN rewards r ON c.customer_id = r.customer_id WHERE c.total_purchases < 5000;
SELECT customer_name, total_purchases FROM customers ORDER BY total_purchases DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT customer_name, total_purchases FROM customers WHERE total_purchases > 1000 ORDER BY total_purchases ASC
SELECT customer_name, SUM(rewards_points) AS total_points FROM customers JOIN rewards ON customers.customer_id = rewards.customer_id GROUP BY customer_name ORDER BY total_points DESC
SELECT * FROM customers JOIN rewards ON customers.customer_id = rewards.customer_id WHERE rewards_points >= 5000 ORDER BY total_purchases ASC
SELECT customer_name, total_purchases FROM customers WHERE customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM rewards WHERE rewards_points > 2000) ORDER BY customer_name
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM purchases WHERE purchase_amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_name, purchase_amount FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 2;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM purchases WHERE purchase_amount > 1000 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, SUM(reward_points) AS total_points FROM customers JOIN rewards ON customers.customer_id = rewards.customer_id GROUP BY customer_name HAVING total_points > 500;
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM Customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT purchase_id, total_amount FROM Purchases WHERE total_amount > 100 ORDER BY total_amount ASC;
SELECT customer_id, reward_points, expiration_date FROM RewardsPoints WHERE reward_points >= 500 ORDER BY expiration_date DESC;
SELECT offer_name, discount, start_date, end_date FROM Offers WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM Customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%';
SELECT customer_name, total_amount FROM Customers JOIN Purchases ON Customers.customer_id = Purchases.customer_id WHERE purchase_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT customer_name, reward_points FROM Customers JOIN RewardsPoints ON Customers.customer_id = RewardsPoints.customer_id WHERE reward_points > 500;
SELECT * FROM Customers JOIN Offers ON Customers.customer_id = Offers.customer_id WHERE end_date > '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE rewards_points > 100;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_name, total_amount FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id;
SELECT offer_description, discount_percentage FROM offers WHERE expiry_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE rewards_points > 100
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1
SELECT customer_name, total_amount FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id
SELECT product_id, price FROM products WHERE price < 50 ORDER BY product_id DESC
SELECT customer_name, offer_description FROM customers JOIN customer_offers ON customers.customer_id = customer_offers.customer_id JOIN offers ON customer_offers.offer_id = offers.offer_id
